characters.story: Discount ax ax questions "Juh? Break?" curiously - bend fracture bone!

Pass away road philosopher commands sharply "Shir!" - die perish!
Vow philosopher words commands sharply "Shir!" - oath pledge!
Elated ax ax ax sings "Shin!" cheerfully - joyful happy!
Uncover fingers elated sings "Shyan!" cheerfully - lift reveal!

Towering mountain hew bends down drooping "Jahn" - lofty steep!
Take apart fingers reprimand sings "Chigh!" cheerfully - dismantle tear apart!
Blow up fire take apart commands sharply "Jah!" - explode bomb!

Perch tree wife sings "Chee!" cheerfully - dwell roost!
